attributes.action: Sort out the Water Industry in this Country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With three million extra houses planned in the near future, one of the most essential needs will be more water.
In this summer of water plentifullness nothing seems to have taken place to ensure this situation continues unabated.
I therefore call on the Prime Minister to sort out this ill planned mess.
This should entail installation of a countrywide water grid by current water utilities that will use the plentiful supply of water abounding within the UK at all times,  irrespective of any unseasonal flooding. 
Accepted fact, details enough is available to allow everyone a sufficient quantity when needed, even in the South and East of Britain, where only last year pressures were cut back and hosepipe restrictions imposed.
Natural Gas was piped across this country years ago, so why can water (a life giving necessity) not be treated likewise?
